# kallisto

## Genotyping

```{r}
read_tsv("./expression/kallisto/genotyping_accuracies.tsv") %>%
  filter(th == .05) %>%
  mutate(accuracy = accuracy * 100) %>%
  select(locus, `accuracy (%)` = accuracy) %>%
  kable()
```

## Expression

```{r}
include_graphics('./plots/hlasimul.png')
```
